name: windtalk
description: Simplest way to communicate between windows/iframes.

scripts.build: npm run build-d && npm run build-umd
scripts.build-d: rollup index.js --o dist/windtalk.js --f iife --name "windtalk" && npm run minify-d
scripts.build-umd: rollup index.js --o dist/windtalk.umd.js --f umd --name "windtalk" && npm run minify-umd
